## Describe the bug
Please tell me what is happening.

## Screenshots
It's not mandatory, but optional if available.

## Platforms
 - OS: [e.g. macOS 26.3]
 - octorus version: [e.g. 0.4.0]
- terminal: [e.g. ghostty]
- editor: [e.g. helix]

## Checklist
Please check the following if it seems to be related to a bug.

- [ ] `vi` is installed
- [ ] It can be reproduced in the latest version
